word_mean: 破裂，破坏：由于外界的损坏或干扰，使最初是正常的发育过程发生形态缺陷

sentence.Network_cn: 国家处于分崩离析之中.

sentence.Network_en: The strike is expected to cause delays and disruption to flights from Britain.
sentence.Network_cn: 预计罢工将导致英国航班的延误和中断。

sentence.Network_en: The disruption has now spread and is affecting a large part of central Liberia.
sentence.Network_cn: 混乱局面已经扩散，正在影响利比里亚中部的大片地区。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 审判首先包括人与上帝间关系的破裂。从人被逐出伊甸园这点，最容易清楚地看出。其次，男人与女人间的关系也破裂了，男人和女人间原本的完美和谐，由争竞与互相指控所取代（创3：12，16）。第三，人与环境的关系也破裂了，被造界的实体不再在人的管辖之下（创3：17-19）。“破裂”（disruption）这个词不是用来分散人的注意力的，以致于忽略了罪的刑罚的严重性。人在天国之外不只是在罪的刑罚下，更严重.
...种球蛋白血症的病人，才对ψLC 在人B细胞发育过程中的重要性开始重视。 该病人经免疫学分析显示，在B细胞发育过程中出现的分裂（disruption）可能比λ5缺陷小鼠的表现更严重。既然迄今为止仅有一个伴随λ5 突变的患者被发现，还不清楚是否已观察到.

list.abs: 石油英语词汇(D4)|无忧教育 ... disruptive strength 击穿强度 disruptive test 击穿试验 disruptive voltage 崩溃电压.
精华区文章阅读 ... environmental capacity 环境容量 environmental disruption 环境破坏 public nuisance 公害.
石油词汇英语翻译(CD) ... disruptive spark 击穿火花 disruptive strength 击穿强度 disruptive test 击穿试验.
破坏性创新（disruptive innovation）(英文：Disruptive innovation)，亦被称作破坏性科技，是指将产品或服务透过科技性的创新，并以低价特色针对特殊目标 …
我们常将破坏式创新(disruptive innovation)挂在嘴边，破坏(disruptive)让人兴奋，也让人充满希望。两年来，一直有创业家问我，团购 …

entry.def: When there is disruption of an event, system, or process, it is prevented from continuing or operating in a normal way.

example.ex: The strike is expected to cause delays and disruption to flights from Britain...
example.tran: 预计罢工将导致英国航班的延误和中断。

example.ex: The rail strike is causing major disruptions at the country's ports.
example.tran: 铁路罢工使该国港口陷入了一片混乱。

means.word_mean: 1. an act of delaying or interrupting the continuity;

sentences.sentence: "they were amazed by the furious disturbance they had caused"

means.word_mean: 3. an event that results in a displacement or discontinuity

auth_sentence.content: Could this be the start of The Great Disruption?

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Could this be the start of The Great Disruption?

auth_sentence.content: There was also disruption in Manama, the capital.
auth_sentence.res_content: There was also disruption in Manama, the capital.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was also disruption in Manama, the capital.

auth_sentence.content: The faulty gene causes this disruption in the chromosome.
auth_sentence.res_content: The faulty gene causes this disruption in the chromosome.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The faulty gene causes this disruption in the chromosome.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 突然的,出其不意的;[行为等]粗鲁无礼的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ab离开+rupt断裂→突然的[断开,离开]
bank银行+rupt断裂→adj.破产的;彻底缺乏的 v.使破产n.破产者
cor全部+rupt断→全部断→变坏的,腐败的
bank银行+rupt断裂→adj.破产的;彻底缺乏的 v.使破产n.破产者
corrupt[adj.腐败的;变环的]+ion表名词→n.腐化;腐坏;败坏
disrupt[v.使混乱,使崩溃,使分裂,使瓦解]+ion表名词→n.中断,分裂,瓦解,破坏
interrupt[v.中断,遮断,阻碍;打断[话],打扰]+ion表名词→n.中断,打断;障碍物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 破裂, 决裂, 敌对, 割裂
stems_affixes.word_buile: rupt断裂+ure→n.&v.破裂, 决裂, 敌对, 割裂
bank银行+rupt断裂→adj.破产的;彻底缺乏的 v.使破产n.破产者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使混乱,使崩溃,使分裂,使瓦解
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis分开+rupt断裂→分开断→使崩溃,瓦解

stems_affixes.value_cn: 中断,遮断,阻碍;打断[话],打扰
stems_affixes.word_buile: inter在……中间+rupt断裂→讲话中间被打断

Sentence.sentence: Amid all the job losses, there's no category of worker that the economic disruption has been good for: nonhumans.
